mapper.insert: insert into hotel (ph_num, ph_p_count, ph_price, ph_name, ph_star, ph_address, ph_d_address, ph_img, ph_latitude, ph_longitude) values (pethotel_seq.nextval, #{ph_p_count}, #{ph_price}, #{ph_name}, #{ph_star}, #{ph_address}, #{ph_d_address}, #{ph_img}, #{ph_latitude}, #{ph_longitude} )
mapper.update: update PetHotel set ph_name=#{ph_name}, ph_star=#{ph_star}, where ph_num = #{ph_num}
